resources.string:
Cherechedza:

 1. Kana maCoin akasa oneka watenga, dzvanya "Tarisa futi"
 2. MaCoin anenge atengwa, anowedzera pamusoro peanenge apihwa. Anenge Atengwa anobatsira kudzikisa zvinodiwa kuitwa kuti uwane maCoin emahara, pamwechete neku dzima maAdvert
 3. MaCoin haisi mari, hatidzorere kana muchinge matenga.
 4. MaCoin anongo shanda pafoni ino chete, kubvisa data reapplication ino maCoin anobviswawo futi (Zvinogona kuchinja nekufamba kwenguva).
%1$d maCoin awedzerwa pamudziyo uno . Order Id: %2$s
